name: SKY is ARROWS
blurb: A real-time strategy game from Yale Winter, a small team, and YOU!

rewards.reward: You own SKY is ARROWS! It is available for PC or Mac to download when the game is released, streaming from us or through steam. You get exclusive access to the beta of SKY is ARROWS to play before launch. You also gain membership to the backers forum where I will read and comment on suggestions for the game. And get bi-weekly video updates from us to get a sneak peek at the development of SKY is ARROWS.
Get your name featured in the game! For example on a totem, tombstone, or somewhere else. I'll choose where your name goes and let you know where it is. You also get all previous rewards.
You get a premium edition box containing the game on a CD, art booklet, and a signed poster. Free shipping to the US. Pay $20 for shipping otherwise. You also get all previous rewards.

Get 5 additional digital copies of the game. These  copies are also able to join in the beta. Get a SKY is ARROWS T-shirt. Choose from 3 designs. There is one design for each faction and they say Backer on them. You also get all previous rewards.

Unlocks super secret and hilarious view modes. Think of the famous "Cow / Pony Level." There will be a few view modes for your entertainment. Including one where knights slap each other with fish instead of swords, and archers shoot rainbows... Or something to that effect. Also unlocks the T-Rex unit for the Wyrm, as well as two more units on the other factions. Get 2 additional digital copies of the game, but these are special in that they have any bonuses yours has. These copies are also able to join in the beta. You also get all previous rewards.

Become a GOLD BACKER. Create your own custom rune! Choose which existing unit it will belong to. Choose from any stats and/or design your own ability that your rune provides. I will put your design into the game as you specify. It will be balanced by me and I will choose to make the rune available to everyone or just you and the very top level backers. Get all 3 SKY is ARROWS T-shirts. You also get all previous rewards.

Become a PLATINUM BACKER. Create your own custom unit! Choose whatever stats you like and what it's animations look like. Have it look like you, or any creature you can think of! An animator will be at your service to bring your unit to life. Also provide for it 3 runes with up to two abilities total. It will be balanced by me and I will choose to make the unit available to everyone or just you and the very top level backers. I'll work with you to get your unit made and in the game. You also get all previous rewards.

Become a DOUBLE PLATINUM BACKER!!! Lunch with Yale and a tour of the workplace in Los Angeles. Also a special thank you video to thank you personally. You gain access to ALL custom units and runes created by other backers. A 3D print of each faction's main building. You also get all previous rewards.
